string.name: descending
string.comment:
descending
General method for sorting games in the Advanced Search function. Applies to multiple categories for sorting games. https://lichess.org/games/search

string.name: ascending
string.comment:
ascending
General method for sorting games in the Advanced Search function. Applies to multiple categories for sorting games. https://lichess.org/games/search

plurals.name: gamesFound
plurals.comment:
gamesFound [one] [other]
%s are the number of games matching your search criteria.
Appears in the Advanced Search tool: https://lichess.org/games/search
